metadata.name: Added Credentials to Existing Application
metadata.comment: Detects when a new credential is added to an existing application. Any additional credentials added outside of expected processes could be a malicious actor using those credentials.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(LOWER(message)) in ('update application-certificates and secrets management', 'update service principal/update application'))

output.summary: Detects when a new credential is added to an existing application. Any additional credentials added outside of expected processes could be a malicious actor using those credentials.

metadata.objective: False positive: When credentials are added/removed as part of the normal working hours/workflows Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-applications#application-credentials
